snippet.title: =My friend sent me a friend request and it wont let her because it says i have too many friends.?
snippet.description: I only have 427 friends. Other ppl have like 1,000 and up friends!! Y is it doing tht

snippet.title: If our brains are only capable of dealing with 150 people?
Would a utopia be awkward at first?
snippet.description: A utopia where everyone could live really, really well would re-define how we relate to one another. Everybody would be like best friends relative to our world. Doesn't it seem awkward to think...
